column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The pastries are great
column2: but I really come here for the bread. Soooo good. As a barista of many years
column3: I love trying new shops and supporting places that serve locally roasted coffee. I have given their espresso many chances
column4: but it simply hasn't been good. They use good-quality beans
column5: but don't seem to be treating them right. I would skip the spro and get a hot chocolate
